CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT and then leaves the room
CHI sits on the floor then picks up the toy car and plays with it
CHI turns in the direction of MOT then bends down in front of the jack+in+the+box
CHI watches as MOT turns the handle . <aft> CHI stands up then moves closer to the jack+in+the+box and reaches for the handle
MOT refers to CHI trying to turn the handle
MOT pushes the clown down then lets it go
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box down while holding a toy car in his other hand
MOT takes the car from CHI and puts it on the floor
CHI leans over then picks the toy car up again
<aft> CHI sits on the floor in front of MOT and looks in her direction
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI turns and looks behind him then turns back and looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn the handle
CHI watches MOT while holding the toy car in one hand
CHI watches MOT then reaches forward and touches the clown
MOT stuffs the clown back in then closes the lid
<aft> MOT leans back and looks at CHI
CHI looks down at the car in his hands then reaches for the jack+in+the+box
<bef> MOT reaches over and takes CHI cap off of his head
CHI leans forward and touches the handle
MOT refers to jack+in+the+box popping out
CHI pushes the clown down then lets go
MOT tries to close the lid
CHI seems excited by jack+in+the+box activity
CHI sits back and watches MOT while holding the car in one hand
MOT pushes the jack+in+the+box down and closes the lid
MOT pushes the clown down and tries to close the lid
CHI presses down on the lid
<aft> CHI leans back while holding the car in his hands
MOT presses down on the lid
MOT adjusts the handle and the lid remains closed . <aft> MOT takes off her sweater
CHI reaches out and turns the handle . <aft> CHI leans back and looks down at the car in his hands
CHI looks up in the direction of MOT then reaches out for the handle
CHI still holds the car in one hand
MOT helps CHI turn the handle
MOT lets go of the handle
MOT reaches over for CHI and moves CHI so he is facing the camera
<bef> MOT places the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI on the floor
MOT winds the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI reaches down and touches the lid just as it opens
<bef> MOT closes the lid with CHI

CHI tries to open the lid with his fingers
MOT moves around behind CHI and reaches for his hand
MOT takes the toy car from CHI
MOT places CHI hand on the handle
CHI looks down then turns the handle once
CHI picks up the toy car
CHI turns around and reaches for something behind him . <aft> CHI stands and turns toward MOT then holds out a toy
MOT takes the toy duck from CHI
CHI reaches for the duck then kisses it
CHI turns away from MOT and walks over to the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts the duck on the jack+in+the+box
CHI bends down and picks up the duck
CHI still holds the car in one hand . the camera moves
CHI looks up at the camera
CHI looks down at the duck then holds it out to MOT
MOT takes the duck and squeezes it
CHI stands up and backs up a few steps then sits down on the book on the floor
CHI gets up on his knees and rolls the car back and forth on the floor
<aft> CHI sits down on the floor across from MOT and looks at the car in his hands then reaches for book
<aft> MOT holds the book in front of CHI
CHI looks at the car in his hand then at the book
CHI tugs at the page . <aft> CHI closes the book
CHI puts the toy car on top of the jack+in+the+box
MOT watches CHI while holding the book on her lap
CHI moves across the room rolling the car on the ground
MOT watches CHI as she changes her position on the floor
MOT tries to get CHI back into full camera view
CHI stops then looks up in direction of MOT . <aft> CHI stands up then looks across the room with his back to the camera
CHI walks across the room then stops when beside MOT . CHI looks at MOT
<aft> CHI walks over to the door
<bef> CHI turns away from the door then looks around the room
MOT looks at the camera then at CHI
CHI stares at the camera while holding the car in his hand
CHI turns then walks to the door and touches it
CHI turns around then looks up at the camera
CHI looks at MOT then takes a few steps away from the door . <aft> CHI looks up at the camera
<bef> MOT looks at the camera then at CHI
CHI points to the other side of the room
MOT looks to where CHI is pointing
<bef> CHI looks around then turns and walks over to the door
CHI turns then walks across the room toward the camera . CHI looks around the room as he walks
CHI stops in the middle of the room and looks up at the camera then down at the floor then up at the camera again
CHI walks closer to the table then puts his hand on it . <aft> CHI looks into the camera then looks over his shoulder
CHI turns around in response to noise outside
CHI turns around again to look at the camera then runs toward the door as INV opens it

INV enters the room at 13:13:51 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters the room at 13:20:30 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the brush to hold
INV puts the object on the table
CHI reaches out for the object
CHI reaches for object with his free hand
<$=3> MOT holds both of CHI's hands to his chest
CHI struggles to reach the object
MOT prevents CHI from touching the object
MOT tries to console distressed CHI
INV lets CHI touch the object
MOT looks at CHI then at object
<aft> CHI reaches for his drinking bottle then puts it in front of him on the table
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV leaves the room
MOT takes CHI out of the seat on the table then puts him on the floor in front of the box
CHI bends over the box then reaches in and removes the ball
CHI holds the ball with his back to the camera
CHI turns toward MOT while holding the ball up to his mouth

CHI action is not completely visible

<$=1> MOT is out of camera range by the desk

the box cover was stuck in one corner

CHI picks up a box that was beneath the one he threw off to the side

MOT opens the box that CHI had discarded
CHI climbs into the box then picks up crayons that are inside the box
MOT moves CHI around in the box then slides a piece of paper out from underneath him
MOT puts the paper on top of the box for CHI

MOT points to the crayon in CHI's other hand

End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
